title: IDEA FOR SKIN AMUMU!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
body:
In this concept Amumu is call Apupu (Apoo poo).
Basically Amumu becomes a little poop.
He is wrapped in toilet paper and does a toilet paper toss rather than bandage.
his ult is a swirling toilet bowl that he uses to FLUSH HIS FOES :D

replies.body: i don't even want to know what his tears are made of {{item:3070}}
